================"""

**Governement Tender Announcement**

### Title
**Removal, Supply and Installation of Propane Tanks**

- **Reference Number:** WS3888978644-Doc3969024137
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3888978644
- **Publication Date:** 2023-04-17
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-06-06
- **Tender Closing Date:** June 13, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 23, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2023

### Description
Parks Canada requires the following services:

* The purge and removal of six propane tanks
* The supply of six new propane tanks
* The installation of the new tanks

The contract period is from the date of contract award to October 31, 2023, inclusive.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Melanie Perrin, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16017062?extsite=MTYwMTcwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16017062?extsite=MTYwMTcwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Bidding Process

Please note that the bidding process is competitive and open to all qualified suppliers. Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. The deadline for bid submission is June 13, 2023, at 14:00 (EDT). Late bids will not be accepted. 

Note:
* Experienced contractors have worked off request and bid multiple times from goveprojglobal.org. They have managed to expand business, reduce requests by repeat orders. Current market transparency requires accepted contrators
